persona_profile.education_level: Ensino Médio (or equivalent, implied by diploma mention but no higher degree emphasized)
skills: Observational analysis (e.g., urban grids vs. organic forms)
persona_profile.goals: To refine and integrate their self-directed creative/analytical 'strokes' (skills) into a role that values organic growth over rigid structures, with a focus on collaborative or mentored environments where individual contributions can coalesce into a 'whole picture.' Open to exploring how their hands-on, experiential background might translate into impactful work—particularly in spaces that bridge artistry, community, and systemic observation (e.g., urban planning, sustainability, or creative problem-solving initiatives).
